report.title: Fitlerable Week verification breakdown
report.description: Breaks down records by week and verification status for the last year with standard params support.
report.query: select #columns# from generate_series(0,52) as weeks(no) left join (occurrences occ join cache_occurrences o on o.id=occ.id #agreements_join# and #sharing_filter# ) on date_trunc('week', occ.verified_on)=date_trunc('week', CURRENT_DATE - (weeks.no*7)) and occ.verified_on is not null #joins# where 1=1 #idlist#

column.name: queried
column.sql: count(case o.record_status when 'D' then o.id when 'S' then o.id else null end)

column.name: verified
column.sql: count(case o.record_status when 'V' then o.id else null end)

column.name: rejected
column.sql: count(case o.record_status when 'R' then o.id else null end)
